# [FEAT] Web Messaging

## Labels
`omnichannel`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement asynchronous web messaging for persistent conversations that don't require real-time presence.

## Requirements

### Messaging Widget
- Persistent conversation history
- Asynchronous communication
- Push notifications
- Mobile-friendly design
- Rich media support

### Conversation Features
- Message threading
- Conversation context preservation
- Bot-to-agent handoff
- Conversation search
- Message status (sent, delivered, read)

### User Experience
- Login/authentication options
- Anonymous messaging
- Conversation history access
- Multi-device sync
- Notification preferences

### Agent Features
- Unified inbox for messages
- Conversation assignment
- Response SLAs
- Quick replies
- Customer context panel

### Integration
- Connect to email notifications
- Mobile app integration
- CRM integration
- Bot/AI integration

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk's messaging platform allows customers to connect through persistent conversations across web and mobile.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Persistent conversations work
- [ ] Push notifications functional
- [ ] Multi-device sync works
- [ ] Bot handoff supported
- [ ] Conversation history preserved
